Posts.Content: Good morning, I had trouble day before yesterday and then yesteday morning in my inbox was a lengthy scam letter telling me that I was chosen by a mrs?? ( can't remember her name) I deleted it but she said she was rich and dying of cancer and needed to leave 24 million dollars to some one that would carry out her wishes. I was to put up a certain fee and then I would get instructions on how to proceed, Only by E-Mail. Did any one else get this or a version of it? Shary
Posts.Title: What is Happening to the Discussion Board? Can't log on in afternoon and couldn't last night

Posts.Content: Hi, I hope you are feeling better today
